section.title: Are you sure you want to do this?
section.para: OpenNMS is a complex software product, and it does not (yet) have a simple "./configure && make && make install" build process like many other tools. If there is a packaged release for your operating system, we highly suggest you use that instead. If you have problems with a packaged release, please see the troubleshooting section for assistance.

section.title: Install prerequisite applications
section.para: See the chaper on installing prerequisites for OpenNMS and install all prerequisites.

section.title: Download source
section.para: You can download source for a specific release, or you can download source directly from the source code respository (CVS). You probably want to download released source unless you wish to do development or are looking for specific features or bug fixes that are not yet in a release.
